runs.comm: starts with a wide down leg which Taibu takes standing up
nips back in from outside off and Nicol hurriedly defends down the pitch
gets this to swing into Nicol who misses the flick to leg, hits the pad and rolls away for Taibu to collect
this one moves away a touch outside off on a good length, defends into the covers
again slips this down leg past Nicol's attempted swing
gets this to angle into Nicol who defends with a straight bat, quiet start for New Zealand
angling in from outside off again and Nicol squeezes it through square leg
gets this to angle into off and it seams away beautifully past the outside edge as Franklin is left groping
gets this to swing away late outside off and he induces an edge from Nicol which goes to first slip on the bounce

charges down the track and plays one of his favourite shots, the short-arm jab pull, which sends the ball sailing over long-on towards the pavilion, lands on one of the corporate hospitality tables where one of the guests' drinks is rudely interrupted!
comes down and tucks off middle behind square with soft hands which allows them to rush back for a couple
again strays on the pads and he softly pats it into the leg side once more allowing them to steal a second once more

could have been a run-out as they set off for their third successive two, he had flicked it past the diving backward square fielder on the edge of the circle and they rushed back but the throw was wide of Taibu who took the bails off as Nicol put in a full-stretch dive, had it been on target Nicol would have been gone
on the pads and he flicks it flat in the air behind square, fielder in the deep runs round and dives to cut it off
full on middle and leg and worked to mid-on
this swings away from the bat and he slaps it across the line to mid-on, timed too well to grab a single
this is on middle and leg and Nicol chips it over the mid-on fielder down to the fence
short outside off, goes back to punch to mid-off
short and wide outside off, waits on the back foot to crack the cut through the covers to the fence
good length ball on off and he mistimes the drive off the inside edge back down the pitch
angling across the left-hander outside off and he misses the pull, it was too full for that stroke and possibly too wide as well
full outside off and he drives straight to cover, took the hand off the bat as he played that
nice tight line on middle and off, Franklin can only squeeze it down to third man
make it five, top over from Jarvis so far and this was the best ball of the lot, yorker right in the blockhole and Franklin is late in trying to jam down on it, hits the bat and sneaks past leg stump
no he can't, short ball on leg undoes some of the good work and Franklin swivels to help it on its way behind backward square
shoved well down leg and he can't connect with the attempted slog sweep over fine leg
on the pads and flicked nice and fine down to the fence
this swings away outside off past the attempted hit over the infield
full on middle and swings across the line over square leg into the seating area at Seddon Park
hangs back and defends past the bowler into the off side
defends an accurate ball on off down the pitch
full toss on the pads to end the over, Franklin happily whips it through midwicket to the boundary
slow ball outside off turns in and hits the pad outside the line as he tries to slog sweep
plays this softly into the covers

lots of action there, this was delivered from around the wicket to the left hander and skidded on past the defence, hit the pad, loud appeal for lbw turned down, replays show it clipping the top of middle and leg, while they were appealing Franklin had set off and had to turn back quickly to beat the direct hit from third man
punches a full toss without much timing to the left of cover
fired down the leg side
full outside off and digs it out back to Price
pushed through on off and he works it across his pad to long-on
full outside off and he can't get the drive past short cover
this is shorter on leg and swings it away through square leg
full outside off and he swings it down to long-on, the spinners bringing the New Zealand run rate down quickly
comes down the track and punches through the covers into the deep
full outside off and he carves it in the air on the bounce down to third man
big appeal for lbw as he misses the flick to leg but it was going down, it rolls away and they take a leg-bye
opens the face and dabs a slower ball behind point
charges down the track and swings straight to wide mid-on
and he responds by moving across slightly and swinging a gentle ball on middle and leg over square leg into the stands
this is a bigger and better shot, half-volley on leg and he flicks it with timing and power right into the top row of the stands at wide long-on
outside off turning in and he slog sweeps behind square one bounce over the boundary
this is full on the stumps and he hits it flat over the long-on boundary
fired in down leg past the attempted swing to leg
full ball outside off which is squeezed to deep cover
comes down the track and lofts with considerable elevation, but he only just gets the distance as long-on runs round and puts in a despairing dive as the ball lands a foot over the rope
slow outside off, turns in after beating Nicol's attempted cut
gets down on one knee and swings it high over cow corner to bring up his half-century as New Zealand are on track
goes back and plays behind point
tossed up outside off and Franklin waits before hitting cleanly through the line over long-on to bring up the 100 for New Zealand
very slow outside off at 79kph, waits and dabs into the off side where the fielder fumbles
works this down to long-on after using the feet
and he strikes a vital blow for Zimbabwe with his first ball! Slices a ball outside off without the desired timing straight to the cover sweeper
drives a full ball down to long-off
this is angling into the pads and clipped away behind square
in the blockhole outside off and he jams it out to backward point
Franklin flashes at one going across him outside off without moving the feet
full toss outside off and driven down to long-off, 3 runs and a wicket to end an excellent over by the former Zimbabwean captain
full outside off and driven to deep cover
defends an accurate delivery on middle and off back to the bowler
slips this one full down leg and Baz gets bat on it to squeeze it very fine down to the boundary as New Zealand are on the Nelson. David Shepherd would be hopping away if he were still with us...
defends a good comeback delivery on off back down the pitch
Baz gets his team off the Nelson with a clip off the pads between the mid-on and midwicket fielders
full in the blockhole and he digs out a drive back to Jarvis to end another decent over for Zimbabwe
goes back and clips to the midwicket sweeper
goes back and punches back down the pitch past a diving Price to long-off
opens the face and dabs between cover and point
just a fraction short and Franklin is able to get on the back foot and pull past the diving fielder on the cow corner boundary
flicks a ball on leg square of the wicket to bring up his maiden fifty in T20 internationals
fired in down leg and it hits the pad, rolls to the right of short fine leg
Baz rocks back and cracks this powerfully over the head of cover into the rope
slams this ball on middle and off over Utseya and one bounce into the sightscreen
works a full ball to long-on
Franklin drags this full ball outside off towards cow corner without much timing, looks to be going for a boundary nevertheless but Waller dives on the rope to cut it off
short outside the off stump and he cracks it off the back foot to the cover sweeper
gentle long hop on leg stump and he swings this into the crowd at square leg

again on the pads and he flicks it flat into the deep, the batsmen hesitate in the middle of the pitch before Franklin decides to go for the second, puts in the full-stretch dive but a brilliant throw from Keegan Meth on the boundary nails the stumps direct with Franklin well short
de Grandhomme defends his first ball in international cricket back down the pitch off the back foot
swings a full ball on off on the bounce to long-on
full outside off and he gets down on a knee to blaze it to deep cover
short on middle and leg, he top-edges the pull high into the sky but it gets over the fielder at fine leg easily and rolls into the rope for his first boundary
flicks a full ball on leg through midwicket
full outside off, he backs away and toes it through third man to bring up the 150 for New Zealand
comes down the track and misses the flick, is hit on the pad, Price has a few words to say to de Grandhomme who played for Zimbabwe's Under 19 side
waits and punches off the back foot into the deep on the off side, gave himself a bit of room there
short ball on leg and Baz seizes onto the length quickly and pulls through square leg, Price admonishes himself for the error in length
off the pad and it rolls to leg
full outside off and squeezed into the deep
Baz misses out on a full toss outside the off stump, tried to swing to leg and is angry for missing out on a boundary opportunity
plays this into the deep on the off side and the fielder fumbles but the batsmen turn down the chance of a second
Zimbabwe get rid of the new boy with a full ball outside off, he tried to thrash it through the covers without moving the feet, gets a thick inside edge which careers into middle stump
dropped down at long-on, full ball on the stumps was hit with a skewed blade towards Hamilton who lost his footing and tried to recover in vain but he could only get a hand to it
swings a ball outside off into the deep at square leg
full ball is worked to long-on
outside off and he misses the sweep, beats not only the batsman but also Taibu and heads to the boundary for four damaging byes
wide of off, beat the cut and is called for line late
this time gets it closer to off and beats the cut again
goes back and hits into the deep on the off side
outside off and he sweeps in front of square past midwicket in the circle, said two straightaway and they get it
drills a full ball straight to cover, who fumbles it towards long-off which lets them take the single
starts with a horrendous full toss which is swung away into the stands at square leg, New Zealand regain the upper hand
full toss on leg and he flicks it away again towards square leg but this one settles in the hands of Waller right on the rope and Zimbabwe wrestle back the initiative

full outside off and he gets down a knee to slam it over the cover boundary but he slices it high into the air and it settles in the hands of Elton at deep cover, two wickets in two balls and Zimbabwe hold their catches at the crucial moments to get a firm grip on the game
fired into off and he squeezes it through midwicket
gets down a knee first ball does Kane, a brave stroke gets the reward as he swings it to the cow corner fence past the diving fielder
fired into middle and he squeezes it through midwicket, they rush back for a risky second and Kane puts in a dive which saves him from being run out, 14 needed from the last over
starts with a full toss which is swung away but straight to deep midwicket without much timing or power

another full toss outside off and Shingi isn't so fortunate this time, even though Kane had backed away he stretched for it and took a hand off the bat as he managed to time it perfectly and bisect the fielders in the deep on the cover boundary
New Zealand should win this now after a superb strike from Williamson, half-volley in the slot and he swings it high over the long-on boundary, run a ball from here

Kane Williamson has belied his small stature to play a 'big' innings here, he came in at number 7 with 21 needed off 9 balls and has scored 20 from just 5 balls, the final boundary was a full ball which was sliced away over point and to the fence
